column4: can anyone recommend a webcam app? I am looking at a list of them and trying to determine which I should use.
preferably one with a GUI
but thats just for chat, right?
I want one for motion capturing, I am going to be documention the behaviour of a rat, and I want to record his movement
something special about this rat?
tracking movements is not easy to do
there are several programs for it
yes, I know, but I'm not that impressed with them.  are you?
I am not sure yet. hence why I am asking which I should try out
thinking about CamStream
I haven't looked at them for some time.  A scientist I know asked me to look into it but that sort of information gets stale very quickly
have you heard of ZoneMinder?
no.  have a URL?
that's going to give you series of images, but it isn't going to do any analysis for you.
what do you mean by analysis?
figuring out the movements, not just capturing the images
well, I don't mind if it is not motion detective. just as long as I can record the rat while I am away, and then review the video at a later time
for that it looks very good, from reading a bit here.
such files should be too large would they?
depends of course on the resolution.  there is a huge range
for low res the space should be manageable.
it depends on how sophisticated the system is, whether it uses some intelligent compression and manages to save the differences, rather than always saving entire images.
well, only one way to find out
yes, go for it
